tachyon.io

Class JavaByteBufferWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.io.ByteBufferWriter
      • tachyon.io.JavaByteBufferWriter

  • public class JavaByteBufferWriter
extends ByteBufferWriter
    The wrapper for to write ByteBuffer using ByteBuffer's default methods.
